1_12ShEEixS7XubE6ymmNaMCJ9x1bAj8Pk7V.body: En el mundo ideal que imagino antes de haber leído el libro, esta publicación tendría un link a la descarga del libro.

1_18iBBdeEG8gj9XA6wi2zKv4NoHw1B16K3t.body: We need to create a social network that organize our needs, goals, plans and resources in a conscious and sustainable way. Such a network could eventually make states and borders obsolete.
